game.name: Wild Park Manager
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 놀고, 낚시하고, 동물 구경도 하고! 곡괭이로 마구마구 파내며 만드는 세계 최고의 대공원!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Create a park full of animals and flowers, with sports fields and playgrounds!
